scripts.build: npm i && npm i --prefix ./importer-api && npm i --prefix ./importer-mankeli && npm i --prefix ./importer-db-api && ./run.sh build
scripts.test: npm test --prefix ./importer-api && npm test --prefix ./importer-mankeli && npm test --prefix ./importer-db-api
scripts.lintfix: npm run lintfix --prefix ./importer-api && npm run lintfix --prefix ./importer-mankeli && npm run lint:fix --prefix ./importer-db-api
